backend/main.mo: Defines actor with complaint system types and logic, including profile management, complaint submission, status updates, and access control via mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no-op migration function returning the existing actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend React components and pages used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx and setting app metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all routes including /api/whoami and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Renders access-denied messaging with role-specific guidance and link to /api/whoami for principal lookup.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Restricts routes to admin users, showing loading skeletons or access denied when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the global layout with header, navigation, authentication handling, PrincipalIndicator, and responsive UI structure.
frontend/src/components/CategoryTabs.tsx: Renders tab controls for filtering complaints by category including an 'All' option.
frontend/src/components/ComplaintListIte: Displays a complaint card with category, description, urgency, status, and relative timestamp linking to its detail page.
frontend/src/components/ComplaintSearchA: Provides search and filter controls for complaints by text, category, status, and urgency with reset support.
frontend/src/components/PrincipalIndicat: Shows the logged-in user's principal with a modal for full ID display and copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts authenticated users without profiles to enter name and email before continuing.
frontend/src/components/ProofUploadField: Handles uploading and validating proof files with size/type checks, progress tracking, and removal.
frontend/src/components/solutions/Relate: Lists related categories and linked complaint IDs for a solution update.
frontend/src/components/solutions/Soluti: Displays a solution update with title, timestamp, description, and related links.
frontend/src/components/StatusTag.tsx: Displays a styled status badge based on a complaint's status value.
frontend/src/components/SubmitResultBann: Shows a success or error alert banner with title and message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthorization.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the caller's user role and admin status using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerInfo.ts: Provides a query hook to fetch caller identity info, defaulting to a guest principal when no actor exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, complaints, and complaint updates via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styles for the app.
frontend/src/lib/complaintTaxonomy.ts: Maps complaint category enums to user-friendly labels and provides a lookup helper.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminComplaints: Admin interface for viewing, updating, hiding, and deleting complaints with status controls and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLandingPag: Landing page linking to admin tools for managing complaints and solutions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSolutionsP: Admin form to create and publish solutions linked to categories or specific complaints.
frontend/src/pages/ComplaintBoardPage.ts: Displays a filterable complaint board with active and resolved complaints using public complaint data.
frontend/src/pages/ComplaintDetailPage.t: Shows detailed information for a single complaint, including metadata, description, and proof.
Lists official solutions and updates with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitComplaintPage.t: Implements a complaint submission form with validation, proof upload, authentication checks, and mutation to create a new complaint.
frontend/src/pages/WhoAmIPage.tsx: Displays the user's principal ID and role with loading states and clipboard copy support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state, including metadata, architectural notes, issues, and implemented feature records for the complaint‑tracking system.
